title: Cannot open any links from the client. (Chats, client links to external websites i.e match history)
body:
Whenever I click on a link that a friend has sent or any Client integrated links (such as the full match history online), nothing happens.

For example: 1. https://gyazo.com/6518257acac5a8bf8603c465d603e811 
and 2. buttons like this https://gyazo.com/ccd83f7d11d464caaea0af3398a3ee58

I'm sad because after this game I was offered to give some Feedback and that should happen way more frequently. It sadly doesn't, so I was hyped to see one after my game and when I clicked, it instantly closed the offer without opening the link to my browser because I ALWAYS forget that it doesn't do that anymore. It's been like this for two months I believe and now it's really annoying. Any help? I've tried searching for answers, but I haven't came across any.

P.S The "initiate full client repair" option in the client didn't do anything.

replies.body:
Huh.....that's really odd to me tbh. Do me a favor and check for this option in the client settings if you haven't already, the "warn me when I click" option might be interfering with it. Turn that off if you can and see if it makes any difference?


https://i.gyazo.com/b403a78741951a69432b0ae358b9f98e.png
I didn't do anything with my computer nor my League client and somehow it got fixed after a really annoying couple of months. I'm glad it's over, though.
Oh yea, thanks for the reply, but I've had both checked and unchecked as I thought it might make a difference. It didn't :(.
